    • Method Detail

      • toIndexed

        public static IndexedTriangleMesh toIndexed(TriangleMesh mesh)
        Returns the specified mesh as an IndexedTriangleMesh. If the argument already implements this interface, this method simply returns it.
        Parameters:
        mesh - a mesh
        Returns:
        an IndexedTriangleMesh representing the same mesh as the argument

      • toPointList

        public static PointList toPointList(List<Vector3> vertices)
        Returns a new PointList object backed by the specified list. The argument is stored by reference, no further operations should be performed on it.
        Parameters:
        vertices - the list to create the PointList from
        Returns:
        a PointList view of the specified list
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if either the argument or an element of it is null
